item.title: FAQ
item.description:
Frequently Asked Questions

What is this blog about?

I am Building Physical Intelligence for Real-World Robots ü§ñ. Sharing my notes and experinces as a robotics enginner.

Who are you?

I’m Mayur ‚ò∫Ô∏è, a Staff AI & Robotics Engineer with a background in Advanced Robotics & AI from Bristol University from üá¨üáß and experience at Bristol Robotics Lab. I focus on developing intelligent systems that bridge the gap between vision, language, and robotic actions.
